description: The aftermath of Abel’s kidnapping has the Sons reeling - especially Jax, whose grief sends him into deeper turmoil over his future with the MC. Framed for murder, Gemma remains on the lam, and is hit with some unexpected news from her past.
title: SO

description: To get intel on Abel’s whereabouts, Jax and the club help a bounty hunter track down a skip. They also press a source for answers about the attack at Half-Sack’s wake - the MC way. Meanwhile, Gemma deals with her father’s dementia.
title: Oiled

description: To secure weapons and raise money for Abel’s search, the club exploits its porn connections to entertain Henry Lin’s clients, which doesn’t sit well with Opie (Ryan Hurst). Jax’s decision to search for Abel in Canada gets derailed. When Gemma’s dad goes MIA, her prisoner makes plans to do the same.
title: Caregiver

description: Jax and Clay head towards Canada after Jimmy provides misleading intel on Abel’s whereabouts. The rest of the club splits off to help Happy with a pharmaceutical favor in redneck territory. Gemma tries to put old family matters to rest.
title: Home

description: To help Gemma, SAMCRO and Abel, Jax conspires with an unlikely source. Meanwhile, the MC puts Chucky undercover.
title: Turning and Turning

description: To protect their territory, SAMCRO must handle a rat at St. Thomas.
title: The Push

description: The Grim Bastards have a problem that could jeopardize Samcro's new business arrangements.
title: Widening Gyre

description: When SAMCRO pays a visit to another charter, not everyone’s happy to see the mother chapter.
title: Lochan Mor

description: The club embarks on a protection run, the likes of which they’ve never seen before.
title: Turas

description: The IRA wants proof that one of their own has flipped and Samcro intends to give it to them.
title: Firinne

description: While the club's on a man hunt, Jax faces the toughest decision of his life.
title: Bainne

description: With a SAMCRO family member held hostage, Jax must choose between revenge and the good of Charming.
title: June Wedding

description: Both the ATF and the Russians prove obstacles as the club looks to heal old wounds.
title: NS
